data.actual_result: You cannot press the verify account button, even if all the info is typed correctly. (More: the password is not censored)
data.expected_result: You should be able to verify the account when you try to change the email
data.short_description: Changing email page doesn't work when having unverified email, and pressing verify button, on a server that requires to have it verified
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new account - Do not verify the email - Join a sever that requires you to verify the email  - Go to server, and where you should press to chat, press "verify" or whatever the button for verification is called - Press "change email" in the window that pops up - Enter a new email, and the correct password - Observe that even if the password is correct, you cannot press the verify account button.  - Additional information: the password is not censored. This may be a bug too.
